item.title: 爱尔兰经济萎缩是欧元区的一个坏兆头
item.description: 爱尔兰第四季度经济萎缩，这对本周即将公布的欧元区数据来说是个坏兆头。【原文：Ireland’s economy contracted in the fourth quarter, a bad omen for euro-zone data due this week.】

item.title: 瑞典将再次降息
item.description: 瑞典央行很可能在本周下调借贷成本，这可能是其帮助欧洲表现最弱的经济体之一实现增长的最后举措。【原文：The Swedish central bank is likely to cut borrowing costs this week, delivering what could turn out to be its final move to aid growth in one of Europe’s weakest-performing economies.】

item.title: 阿根廷富裕邻国因比索坚挺而减少访问量
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的货币政策让这个以牛肉、红酒和大都会而闻名的南美国家从梦幻般的旅游胜地变成了昂贵的异类，因此阿根廷富裕的邻国在这里度假的人数大大减少。【原文：Argentina’s wealthier neighbors are vacationing far less in the South American country famed for its beef, red wines and cosmopolitan capital as President Javier Milei’s currency policies turn a dreamy tourist bargain into an expensive outlier.】

item.title: 埃及两年来首次发行 20 亿美元债券
item.description: 随着北非国家摆脱几十年来最严重的经济危机，埃及将在近两年来首次发行多达 20 亿美元的美元债券。【原文：Egypt is offering as much as $2 billion in its first dollar bond issuance in almost two years, as the North African nation emerges from the worst economic crisis in decades.】

item.title: 中国量化奇才在对冲基金衰退的阴影下打造 DeepSeek
item.description: 三年前，梁文峰的量化对冲基金公司因在中国股市动荡时期亏损而向投资者深表歉意。【原文：Three years ago, Liang Wenfeng’s quantitative hedge fund firm apologized profusely to investors for losing money during a tumultuous period for China’s stock market.】

item.title: 捷豹路虎寻求 5 亿美元海外贷款
item.description: 塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd）的英国子公司捷豹路虎汽车公司（Jaguar Land Rover Automotive）发表声明称，该公司计划通过离岸贷款融资 5 亿美元，加入印度企业集团的美元债务交易行列。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover Automotive, the British arm of Tata Motors Ltd, is planning to raise $500 million through an offshore loan, according to a company statement, joining a flurry of dollar debt deals from Indian conglomerates.】

item.title: 飞利浦首席执行官警告欧盟不要用法规阻碍人工智能创新
item.description: 荷兰皇家飞利浦公司（Royal Philips NV）敦促欧盟不要设置可能会减缓人工智能发展的监管障碍，因为人们越来越担心欧洲大陆在开发人工智能技术的竞争中处于不利地位。【原文：Royal Philips NV urged the European Union not to create regulatory hurdles that might slow progress in artificial intelligence, amid growing concern about the continent’s absence in the race to develop the technology.】

item.title: 为何科技公司的 DeepSeek 业绩下滑，而市场其他部分却历来安然无恙？
item.description: 一些衡量股市健康状况的指标表明，周一的突然暴跌实际上主要是对全球最大科技公司和人工智能相关股票的孤立打击。【原文：Several measures of stock market health suggest that Monday’s sudden slump was in fact mostly an isolated hit to the world’s biggest technology firms and AI-related shares.】

item.title: 智利参议院批准养老金改革，为关键投票做准备
item.description: 智利参议院批准了一项长期寻求的改革，以提高当前和未来退休人员的养老金，从而将该立法推进到下议院成为法律之前的关键阶段。【原文：Chile’s Senate approved a long-sought reform to raise pensions for current and future retirees, advancing the legislation to a crucial phase in the lower house before it would become law.】

item.title: 市场徘徊不前，投资者需关注鲍威尔的表态
item.description: 随着美联储为期两天的会议开始，投资者已经接受了央行这次可能不会降息的事实。但是，在股市岌岌可危的情况下，他们所期待的是主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔就通胀走向发出的任何信号。【原文：As the Federal Reserve’s two-day meeting begins, investors have accepted that the central bank probably won’t be cutting interest rates this time. But with the stock market at a tenuous point, what they’re looking for is any signal from Chairman Jerome Powell on which way inflation is going.】

item.title: 巴里克与马里就结束金矿争端恢复谈判
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.）和马里将恢复谈判，以解决长达数月之久的关于世界最大金矿之一收入分配的争端。【原文：Barrick Gold Corp. and Mali are set to resume talks on resolving a monthslong dispute over the distribution of revenue from one of the world’s biggest gold mines.】

item.title: 谷歌怒斥欧盟在安卓系统 43 亿欧元罚款中的 "严重 "错误
item.description: 谷歌指责欧盟反垄断监督机构在调查中失误，最终被处以创纪录的43亿欧元（45亿美元）罚款，原因是谷歌涉嫌滥用其安卓手机生态系统的市场力量。【原文：Google accused European Union antitrust watchdogs of blundering their way through a probe that culminated in a record €4.3 billion ($4.5 billion) fine for allegedly abusing the market power of its Android mobile-phone ecosystem.】

item.title: 南非调整通胀篮子，玫瑰葡萄酒和吸食大麻者加入
item.description: 南非将在通胀购物篮中增加玫瑰酒、鼻烟和电子烟笔芯，并删除冷冻薯片和炼乳，以更好地反映该国快速变化的购物习惯。【原文：South Africa will add rose wine, snuff and e-cigarette refills to its inflation basket and remove frozen potato chips and condensed milk to better reflect the nation’s fast-changing shopping habits.】

item.title: 在流动性紧张的情况下，津巴布韦通胀率重回两位数
item.description: 津巴布韦的月通货膨胀率在两个月内首次恢复到两位数，尽管流动性紧缩损害了投资者的利益并抑制了银行贷款。【原文：Zimbabwe’s monthly inflation rate returned to double digits for the first time in two months, despite a liquidity crunch that’s hurt investors and curbed lending by banks.】

item.title: 中国 CXMT 存储芯片突破美国出口管制
item.description: 尽管美国的出口管制旨在限制中国公司的能力，但长信存储器技术公司（ChangXin Memory Technologies Inc.【原文：ChangXin Memory Technologies Inc. has advanced its chipmaking technology in spite of US export controls aimed at capping Chinese companies’ capabilities.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的人工智能模型颠覆了白热化的美国电力市场
item.description:
中国公司正在迅速改变对单个机型电力需求的假设，但人工智能领域的排放问题仍令人担忧。【原文：

The Chinese company is rapidly changing assumptions about individual models’ power needs, but the AI sector’s emissions are still a concern.

】

item.title: 通胀加剧，智利央行将暂停降息
item.description: 智利央行可能会暂停降息，这是自 7 月份以来的首次降息，同时表示，在决策者经受住通胀短期跳升的考验后，可能会在晚些时候再次恢复宽松政策。【原文：Chile’s central bank will likely pause interest rate cuts for the first time since July while signaling it could resume easing again later after policymakers weather a short-term jump in inflation.】

item.title: 南非民主党称将致力于建立团结政府
item.description: 南非第二大政党表示，在努力解决与总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）批准的新法律有关的争议之际，该党将继续致力于南非所谓的民族团结政府。兰特升值。【原文：South Africa’s second-biggest political party said it remains committed to the country’s so-called national unity government, as it works to resolve a dispute over new laws approved by President Cyril Ramaphosa. The rand gained.】

item.title: 据说规则将改变，允许 GPIF 加入日本国债拍卖
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，允许日本政府养老金投资基金直接参与政府债券拍卖的行动正在进行中。【原文：Moves are underway that would allow Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund to participate directly in government bond auctions, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国工业游说团认为今年经济将萎缩 0.1%
item.description: 德国工业游说团体预计，2025 年欧洲最大经济体将连续第三年萎缩，收缩 0.1%。【原文：Germany’s industry lobby reckons Europe’s biggest economy will shrink for a third straight year in 2025, contracting 0.1%.】

item.title: 南非士兵在刚果战斗中丧生，死亡人数增至 13 人
item.description: 又有四名南非士兵在刚果民主共和国东部的战斗中丧生，死亡人数增至 13 人。【原文：Four more South African soldiers were killed in fighting in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, raising the death toll to 13.】

item.title: 指数落后，法国企业期权大行其道
item.description: 虽然对法国主要指数期权的交易兴趣落后于欧洲指数，尤其是基准的欧洲斯托克 50 指数，但对单一指数的交易活动却有所回升。【原文：While interest in trading options on France’s main index has lagged behind European gauges — especially the benchmark Euro Stoxx 50 index — activity on single names has picked up.】

item.title: DeepSeek 显示中国将给美国带来更大冲击的游戏规则
item.description: DeepSeek 新人工智能模型的成功表明，面对美国的出口限制，中国最终可能实现更大的技术突破：生产自己的尖端芯片。【原文：The success of DeepSeek’s new AI model points to how China might eventually achieve an even bigger technological breakthrough in the face of US export curbs: Producing its own cutting-edge chips.】

item.title: 日本央行董事会提名人小田顺子自述
item.description: 小田顺子是首相石破茂选中加入日本央行政策委员会的学术经济学家，此前曾与行长上田一夫共事，很可能会支持他恢复央行正统做法的努力。【原文：Junko Koeda, the academic economist picked by Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba to join the Bank of Japan’s policy board, has worked previously with Governor Kazuo Ueda and is likely to support his efforts to restore an orthodox approach at the central bank.】

item.title: 让股市暴跌的人工智能模型
item.description:
投资者为何对 DeepSeek 感到恐慌？【原文：

Why investors freaked out about DeepSeek.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：让股市一蹶不振的人工智能模型 (播客)
item.description: 周一，股市暴跌，似乎是对中国开发的开源人工智能模型 DeepSeek 出现的反应。在人工智能热潮中成为最大赢家的半导体巨头英伟达（Nvidia）市值缩水 5,890 亿美元，创下美国股市历史上单日最大跌幅。其他芯片制造商和大型科技巨头也纷纷倒下。那么，DeepSeek 是如何做到的呢？它是否对 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 等美国人工智能巨头构成了巨大威胁？这说明了什么？【原文：On Monday, the stock market tanked, seemingly in reaction to the emergence of DeepSeek, an open source AI model developed in China. Nvidia, the semiconductor giant that has been the largest winner of the AI boom, erased $589 billion in market cap, for the biggest one-day wipeout in US stock-market history. Other chipmakers and big tech giants also swooned. So how did DeepSeek do it? Is it a big threat to the American AI giants like OpenAI and Anthropic? What does this say about export restrictio】

item.title: 法国石油家族涉足豪华房地产和钻石业
item.description: 欧洲最大的独立石油公司之一背后的亿万富豪家族正加大对高端房地产、钻石和服装的投资，试图从碳氢化合物领域拓展业务。【原文：The billionaire family behind one of Europe’s largest independent oil companies is boosting investments in high-end real estate, diamonds and clothing as it seeks to branch out from hydrocarbons.】

item.title: 欧元区银行收紧企业信贷标准幅度为 2023 年以来最大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank —）的数据显示，欧元区银行收紧企业信贷标准的幅度达到了2023年以来的最高水平；这使得企业贷款迅速恢复以支持投资的希望破灭。【原文：Banks in the euro area tightened credit standards for companies by the most since 2023, according to the European Central Bank — dashing hopes for a quick recovery in corporate lending that could support investment.】

item.title: 利物浦的乔塔和曼联的蒙特重返六人制联赛
item.description: 球星联盟（Baller League）是一项六人足球比赛，得到了一系列有影响力的人士和前足球运动员的支持，并获得了 Apex Capital 和一批英超球星的新投资。【原文：Baller League, a six-a-side football competition backed by a range of influencers and former footballers, has picked up new investment from Apex Capital and a group of Premier League stars.】

item.title: 首次公开募股失败后，蓝池资本入股金鹅公司
item.description: 意大利奢侈运动鞋制造商金鹅公司（Golden Goose）称，总部位于香港的投资公司蓝池资本（Blue Pool Capital）已持有该公司少数股份。【原文：Golden Goose, the luxury Italian sneaker maker whose planned listing was derailed last year, said Hong Kong-based investment firm Blue Pool Capital has taken a minority stake.】
